Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics

Class Text

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.graphics.SFMLNativeTransformable
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics.SFMLNativeTransformable
org.jsfml.graphics.Text
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics.Text
All Implemented Interfaces:
BoundsObject, Drawable, FontStyle, Transformable, org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable
public class Text extends org.jsfml.graphics.Text implements Drawable, FontStyle, BoundsObject
Represents a graphical text that can be transformed and drawn to a render target. This class implements the TextStyle interface for quick access to the constants provided by it.

  • Field Summary

    • setAlignment

      public void setAlignment(@NotNull @NotNull Alignment alignment)
      Sets the alignment mode of this text. The default value is TOP_LEFT. This does not properly align multiline texts in horizontal direction. For proper multiline text alignment, build a CompoundEntity consisting of multiple Text objects.
      Parameters:
      alignment - the new alignment mode of this text

    • findCharacterPos
